Uses of Class
net.sourceforge.zmanim.hebrewcalendar.JewishCalendar

  • Packages that use JewishCalendar 
    Package Description
    net.sourceforge.zmanim.hebrewcalendar
    The package contain classes that convert between Jewish and Gregorian dates.

    • Uses of JewishCalendar in net.sourceforge.zmanim.hebrewcalendar

      Methods in net.sourceforge.zmanim.hebrewcalendar with parameters of type JewishCalendar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String HebrewDateFormatter.formatOmer(JewishCalendar jewishCalendar)
      Returns a String of the Omer day in the form ל״ג בעומר if Hebrew Format is set, or "Omer X" or "Lag BaOmer" if not.
      String HebrewDateFormatter.formatParsha(JewishCalendar jewishCalendar)
      If the formatter is set to format in Hebrew, returns a string of the current parsha(ios) in Hebrew for example בראשית or ניצבים וילך or an empty string if there are none.
      String HebrewDateFormatter.formatRoshChodesh(JewishCalendar jewishCalendar) 
      String HebrewDateFormatter.formatYomTov(JewishCalendar jewishCalendar)
      Formats the Yom Tov (holiday) in Hebrew or transliterated Latin characters.
